column5: The season starts on Thursday.  If anyone is interested in a pool, PM me or send me an e-mail to [emailÂ protected]
Are you making up the pool yourself or are you gonna use an online venue like nhl.com or cbc?
My own pool, but it will be posted on an online pool-managing site.

What is the format?  Rosters? Positions? Points?  Is it draft or fantasy format?  What pool-hosting site are you using? I HIGHLY recommend Yahoo! Fantasy Hockey (I'm a hardcore poolie and that's what I use)

Trying for a somewhat larger field, so it's a simple box pool. Roughly 10 players from each position, plus some rookies and sophomores.  Points will be simply one point for a goal, one for an assist.  I'll be using officepools.com
WE dont have much time but sounds like fun Im in if its a go.
i'm in as well  go iggy!
I'm in pm me for details, entrance fee etc....  Love hockey pools !!  BL
All of you who said you were in have been PM'd.
